MC_SetKinTransform (FB)
MC_SetKinTransform (FB)
Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_SetKinTransform
This function block sets a kinematic transformation between
the axis coordinate system (ACS) and the machine coordinate system
(MCS).
Note
A tool offset (see
SMC_GroupSetTool
) will be reset
when executing this function block.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Inout
AxisGroup
AXIS_GROUP_REF_SM3
Reference to a group of axis
Input
Execute
BOOL
Sets the kinematic transformation on rising edge
KinTransform
TRAFO.MC_KIN_REF_SM3
The kinematic transformation
Output
Done
BOOL
The transformation has been set successfully
Busy
BOOL
The FB is not finished
Error
BOOL
Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
ErrorID
SMC_ERROR
Error identification

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axis

rows.Comment: Sets the kinematic transformation on rising edge

rows.Comment: The transformation has been set successfully
